name: @sourcegraph/create
description: CLI to bootstrap Sourcegraph npm packages

scripts.package-schema: download http://json.schemastore.org/package | json2ts | prettier --parser typescript > src/package-schema.ts
scripts.travis-schema: download http://json.schemastore.org/travis | json2ts | prettier --parser typescript > src/travis-schema.ts
scripts.tsconfig-schema: download http://json.schemastore.org/tsconfig | json2ts | prettier --parser typescript > src/tsconfig-schema.ts
scripts.tslint-schema: download http://json.schemastore.org/tslint | json2ts | prettier --parser typescript > src/tslint-schema.ts
scripts.renovate-schema: download http://json.schemastore.org/renovate | json2ts | prettier --parser typescript > src/renovate-schema.ts
